Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 10 Mahantaraduka » 10.6 Cittasamuṭṭhānaduka » 10.6.7 Pañhāvāra » 10.6.7.1 Paccayānuloma » 10.6.7.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
Mahantaraduka
Cittasamuṭṭhānaduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
232.
2895Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte nava, pacchājāte nava, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke nava (sabbattha nava), indriye nava, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte pañca, vippayutte nava…pe…  avigate nava.
2896Anulomaṃ.
<< 10.6.7.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāraup Paccanīyuddhāra >>
